00087         public function authenticate($action, $opt = null, $locale = AAWS_LOCALE_US)
00088         {
00089                 // Determine the hostname
00090                 switch ($locale)
00091                 {
00092                         // United Kingdom
00093                         case AAWS_LOCALE_UK:
00094                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.co.uk/';
00095                                 break;
00096 
00097                         // Canada
00098                         case AAWS_LOCALE_CANADA:
00099                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.ca/';
00100                                 break;
00101 
00102                         // France
00103                         case AAWS_LOCALE_FRANCE:
00104                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.fr/';
00105                                 break;
00106 
00107                         // Germany
00108                         case AAWS_LOCALE_GERMANY:
00109                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.de/';
00110                                 break;
00111 
00112                         // Japan
00113                         case AAWS_LOCALE_JAPAN:
00114                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.jp/';
00115                                 break;
00116 
00117                         // Default to United States
00118                         default:
00119                                 $hostname = 'http://ecs.amazonaws.com/';
00120                                 break;
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 // Send the request to the service.
00124                 $request_url = $hostname . 'onca/xml?Service=AWSECommerceService&AWSAccessKeyId=' . $this->key . '&Operation=' . $action . '&' . $this->util->to_query_string($opt);
00125                 $request =& new $this->request_class($request_url);
00126                 $request->sendRequest();
00127 
00128                 // Prepare the response.
00129                 $headers = $request->getResponseHeader();
00130                 $headers['x-tarzan-requesturl'] = $request_url;
00131                 $headers['x-tarzan-httpstatus'] = $request->getResponseCode();
00132                 $data = new $this->response_class($headers, $request->getResponseBody(), $request->getResponseCode());
00133 
00134                 // Return!
00135                 return $data;
00136         }

00157         public function browse_node_lookup($browse_node_id, $response_group = 'BrowseNodeInfo', $locale = AAWS_LOCALE_US)
00158         {
00159                 $opt = array();
00160                 $opt['BrowseNodeId'] = $browse_node_id;
00161                 $opt['ResponseGroup'] = $response_group;
00162 
00163                 return $this->authenticate('BrowseNodeLookup', $opt, $locale);

00201         public function cart_add($offer_listing_id, $cart_id, $hmac, $opt = null, $locale = AAWS_LOCALE_US)
00202         {
00203                 if (!$opt)
00204                 {
00205                         $opt = array();
00206                 }
00207 
00208                 // Convert the required values.
00209                 $opt['Item.1.OfferListingId'] = $offer_listing_id;
00210                 $opt['CartId'] = $cart_id;
00211                 $opt['HMAC'] = $hmac;
00212 
00213                 // Convert quantity to the correct format
00214                 if (!isset($opt['Quantity']) || empty($opt['Quantity']))
00215                 {
00216                         $opt['Quantity'] = 1;
00217                 }
00218                 $opt['Item.1.Quantity'] = $opt['Quantity'];
00219                 unset($opt['Quantity']);
00220 
00221                 // Convert listitemid to the correct format.
00222                 if (!isset($opt['ListItemId']) || empty($opt['ListItemId']))
00223                 {
00224                         $opt['Item.1.ListItemId'] = $opt['ListItemId'];
00225                 }
00226                 unset($opt['ListItemId']);
00227 
00228                 return $this->authenticate('CartAdd', $opt, $locale);
00229         }

00319         public function customer_content_search($email_name, $opt = null, $locale = AAWS_LOCALE_US)
00320         {
00321                 if (!$opt)
00322                 {
00323                         $opt = array();
00324                 }
00325 
00326                 if (!isset($opt['CustomerPage']) || empty($opt['CustomerPage']))
00327                 {
00328                         $opt['CustomerPage'] = 1;
00329                 }
00330 
00331                 if (strpos($email_name, '@'))
00332                 {
00333                         $opt['Email'] = $email_name;
00334                 }
00335                 else
00336                 {
00337                         $opt['Name'] = $email_name;
00338                 }
00339 
00340                 return $this->authenticate('CustomerContentSearch', $opt, $locale);
00341         }

00417         public function item_search($keywords, $opt = null, $locale = AAWS_LOCALE_US)
00418         {
00419                 if (!$opt)
00420                 {
00421                         $opt = array();
00422                 }
00423 
00424                 $opt['Keywords'] = $keywords;
00425 
00426                 // Default to 'All' if nothing else has been sent.
00427                 if (!isset($opt['SearchIndex']) || empty($opt['SearchIndex']))
00428                 {
00429                         $opt['SearchIndex'] = 'All';
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 return $this->authenticate('ItemSearch', $opt, $locale);
00433         }
